about.description:
Go is expressive, concise, clean, and efficient. Its concurrency mechanisms
make it easy to write programs that get the most out of multicore and
networked machines, while its novel type system enables flexible and
modular program construction. Go compiles quickly to machine code yet has
the convenience of garbage collection and the power of run-time reflection.
It's a fast, statically typed, compiled language that feels like a
dynamically typed, interpreted language.

name: go-nocgo_osx-64
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.17.5
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: go-nocgo_osx-64
    version: 1.8.7
source:
    -   folder: go
        sha256: 5911e751807eebbc1980dad4305ef5492b96d6cd720bf93cbcefa86e1c195f9e
        url: https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.8.7.src.tar.gz
build:
    binary_relocation: false
    detect_binary_files_with_prefix: false
    missing_dso_whitelist:
        - /usr/lib/libSystem.B.dylib
        - /usr/lib/libgcc_s.1.dylib
        - libc.so.6
    noarch: false
    number: '1002'
    script: build-nocgo-platform.sh
    string: he44337e_1002
requirements:
    build:
        - gettext 0.19.8.1 hcca000d_1001
        - libcxx 7.0.0 h2d50403_2
        - libffi 3.2.1 h0a44026_1005
        - libiconv 1.15 h1de35cc_1004
        - llvm-meta 7.0.0 0
        - sed 4.4 h3efe00b_2001
    run:
        - go-nocgo 1.8.7 h17abafa_1002
test:
    commands:
        - go env
        - go build hello.go
        - file hello`go env GOEXE` | grep 'Mach-O'
    files:
        - hello-c.go
        - hello.go
about:
    description: 'Go is expressive, concise, clean, and efficient. Its concurrency
        mechanisms

        make it easy to write programs that get the most out of multicore and

        networked machines, while its novel type system enables flexible and

        modular program construction. Go compiles quickly to machine code yet has

        the convenience of garbage collection and the power of run-time reflection.

        It''s a fast, statically typed, compiled language that feels like a

        dynamically typed, interpreted language.

        '
    dev_url: https://go.googlesource.com/go
    doc_url: https://golang.org/doc
    home: http://golang.org
    license: BSD-Style
    license_family: BSD
    license_file: go/LICENSE
    summary: The Go Programming Language
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - nehaljwani
        - scopatz
        - sodre
